authorAttributions.displayName: BRISAS DE PUERTO RICO, “#BrisasDePuertoRico” BORINQUEN, PUERTO RICO, USA
BRISAS DE PUERTO RICO, “#BrisasDePuertoRico” BORINQUEN, PUERTO RICO, USA

adrFormatAddress: 1251 Ave of the Americas, New York, NY 10020, USA

originalText.text: I work across the street from this trash. The business teller is terrible, slow, and needs to replaced by a computer. How can this branch have so many tellers yet take so long to give you your money. So the manager tells me to call ahead of time. And you guessed it, nobody picked up. I take my 20 min break to come and pick up cash. The business teller can't even get my transaction done in 20mins. It's too bad that leaving reviews don't change anything. this branch may be good for the people who've worked around that area for years but in not used to slow service. It's like a vacation staff in there. Seriously I'm in a messed up spot since this is the closest branch to me.

originalText.text: I’m calling to thank the employees and especially the manager of this chase bank. Over the weekend I used a chase A.T.M. At 71rst continental in Queens and the machine didn’t dispense the $400 I asked for. Instead, I got an email from chase that the funds were taken from my account and a receipt that said that the machine couldn’t dispense the $400 I asked for . I had to wake up and go to that particular chase bank in Queens and start a claim. This had me so upset that I withdrew all the funds from my account at 6 ave and 49th street in Manhattan ( 1251  6 th Avenue) .The teller asked me how I was and I explained my dilemma. The manager of this chase bank overheard my conversation and he took the time to call me the next day at 8:14 A.M. and asked me if my situation was resolved. I never expected that from a bank. The chase bank on 71rst continental in Queens never even bothered to call me to see if my situation was resolved. I don’t know why this bank has bad reviews, the employees provide a stellar service. It’s a lot safer than the bank on 71rst continental in Queens that has men aggressively pan handling 5 feet from the A.T.M.’s. and making themselves designated doormen.

originalText.text:
Great staff and fast service as this branch is not busy...
But as any other one they will engage you and try to sell lot's of extra services...
be aware and get only what you need and asked for...

originalText.text:
Jajajaja it’s always a pleasure to see the decoration on Christmas. Specially at night when nobody it’s there, plus the cold weather!!!
You can be there alone or with your special one or friends. You can play with your cellphone camera in the slow motion hehe. You’ll enjoy it.
